title: Repository Rule: No Raw Terminal Commands
body: PRIORITY 0 REPO RULE: Never invoke a raw terminal command if an MCP tool achieves the outcome. Tools provide structured, auditable operations and reduce risk of unsafe commands. Use powershell-command instead of direct shell access. This is a BLOCKING security gate that must be enforced.
